{{{
@prefix rdf:     <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>.
@prefix dc:      <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#>.
@prefix exterms: <hhttp://www.example.org/terms/>.

<http://www.example.org/index.html> 
    exterms:creation-date "August 16, 1999";
    dc:language "en";
    dc:creator <http://www.example.org/staffid/85740>.
}}}

Start the Scala REPL. You will need to import Scardf and Joda Time into the classpath (use the `:cp` instruction).

{{{
scala> val dc = Vocabulary( "http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#" )
dc: org.scardf.Vocabulary = Vocabulary(http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#)

scala> val exterms = Vocabulary( "http://www.example.org/terms" )
exterms: org.scardf.Vocabulary = Vocabulary(http://www.example.org/terms)
}}}

{{{
scala> val index = UriRef( "http://www.example.org/index.html" )
index: org.scardf.UriRef = <http://www.example.org/index.html>
}}}

{{{
scala> val b = index -(
     |   exterms\"creation-date" -> "August 16, 1999",
     |   dc\"language" -> "en",
     |   dc\"creator" -> UriRef( "http://example.org/staffid/85740" )
     | )
res0: org.scardf.Branch = <http://www.example.org/index.html>( (<http://www.example.org/termscreation-date>,{"August 16, 1999"}), (<http://purl.org/d
c/elements/1.1/#language>,{"en"}), (<http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#creator>,{<http://example.org/staffid/85740>}) )
}}}

This is a Branch. To make a graph, 
{{{
scala> val g = Graph.build( b )
g: org.scardf.SetGraph = SetGraph[ 3 triples ]
}}}

Let's make sure the graph contains the correct triples:
{{{
scala> g.rend
res7: String =
<http://www.example.org/index.html> <http://www.example.org/termscreation-date> "August 16, 1999" .
<http://www.example.org/index.html> <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#language> "en" .
<http://www.example.org/index.html> <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/#creator> <http://example.org/staffid/85740> .
}}}
